HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Additions: - Now you can use all your races for vanilla starting scenarios! - Added all races for wanderer, refugee, and slave types as well - All of these options are adjustable in Mod Settings

Additions: - Added a config menu. Now you can tweak which pawns are included in various groups. - Replaced the caravan pack animal generation algorithm. Now, trade caravan pack animals will vary in count based on the wares weight, will sometimes show up with a variety of pack animals, and will try to balance the cargo's weight without overloading themselves (usually). Fixes: - The new Archotech Centipede from Genetic Rim is no longer a threat. Unless you want to re-adjust the slider... Tweaks: - A few more variations on faction names - The herdAnimal property is no longer a factor in determining if they are appropriate in combat - Since the pack animal algorithm has been replaced, body size is no longer a factor in determining appropriate caravan pack animals
